message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product for $110. I think it's a fair price, considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can offer you $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price considering the product's value. Let's make this deal happen!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I am comfortable offering $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
